last_episode_to_air.name: Fatal Blow Out
last_episode_to_air.overview:
Final episode. Show was cancelled.

The gang heads to a video game developers conference in Atlantic City where Joe hopes his game will be elected 'Fan Favorite'. When Jessica and Lennon discover that the best game doesn't matter and the award typically goes to whoever throws the best party, they throw a Nerd Bash. Jessica and Rav share an intimate moment but Jessica drops the ball.

name: Best Friends Forever
overview: Best Friends Forever is an American television comedy series that ran on NBC from April 4, to June 1, 2012. The series aired during the 2011â€“2012 NBC primetime season as a mid-season replacement and was created by real-life best friends Lennon Parham and Jessica St. Clair. The pilot episode was made available early through Hulu and NBC.com on March 21, 2012. NBC officially canceled the series on May 11, 2012.

episodes.name: Pilot
episodes.overview: After being served divorce papers, Jessica moves back to Brooklyn where she bunks in with her lifelong BFF, Lennon. For Joe, Lennon's live-in boyfriend, three is definitely a crowd.

episodes.name: The Butt Dial
episodes.overview: Jessica is horrified when she realizes she accidentally butt-dialed her soon-to-be-ex-husband, so Lennon, Joe, and Rav come up with a scheme to make her feel better.

episodes.name: Put a Pin in it
episodes.overview: Lennon's efforts to please Joe's judgmental mother are nearly destroyed when Jessica tries to "help".

episodes.name: Single and Lovin' it
episodes.overview: Jessica dives back into the dating scene after seeing pictures of her estranged husband, Peter, on vacation with his hot new girlfriend. She hooks up with an old crush from high school that ends with bitter disappointment, but ends up rockin' it at a frat house Cougar Party and having the time of her life!

episodes.name: Hey Nonny Nonny
episodes.overview: In an effort to generate new business, Lennon plans a ballet recital at her dance studio, but when her dance partner bails out at the last moment, Jessica and Joe team up together to be her "partner".

episodes.name: Fatal Blow Out
episodes.overview:
Final episode. Show was cancelled.

The gang heads to a video game developers conference in Atlantic City where Joe hopes his game will be elected 'Fan Favorite'. When Jessica and Lennon discover that the best game doesn't matter and the award typically goes to whoever throws the best party, they throw a Nerd Bash. Jessica and Rav share an intimate moment but Jessica drops the ball.
